title: Author Finds Inscrutable Spaces, Secret Cities For 'Unruly Places'
teaser: Alastair Bonnett sought out uncharted and forgotten territories for his new book, Unruly Places. He tells NPR's Tamara Keith about the quest, which included a visit to a traffic island.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
